channel.title: Link of SeisPider
channel.description: Recent content on Link of SeisPider

item.title: General geophysics forward modelling codes
item.description: Volcano PF3D: PF3D is a Python module that facilitates volcanic ash dispersal modelling using the FALL3D package Geodynamic ASPECT: A parallel, extensible finite element code to simulate convection in both 2D and 3D models. PyLith: an open-source finite-element code for dynamic and quasistatic simulations of crustal deformation, primarily earthquakes and volcanoes. Rayleigh: a 3-D convection code designed for the study of dynamo behavior in spherical geometry.

item.title: Seismological forward modelling codes
item.description: Spectrum element method SES3D: SES3D is a program package for the simulation of elastic wave propagation and waveform inversion in a spherical section. The package is based on a spectral-element discretisation of the seismic wave equation combined with adjoint techniques. Reflectivity method fk: Frequency-Wavenumber (FK) synthetic seismogram package telewavesim: Teleseismic body wave simulation with propagation matrix method Modal summation CPS330: General computer program in seismology

item.title: Seismological inversion codes
item.description: Structure Full Waveform lasif: a data-driven end-to-end workflow tool to perform adjoint full seismic waveform inversions. SeisFlow: differs from previous open-source software in emphasizing both flexibility and HPC portability. DSM kernel: calculate 3D finite frequency Fréchet sensitivity kernels (or 3D waveform partial derivatives) for 1D reference Earth models using Direct Solution Method. Surface wave topo_sp_cu: ray theoretic surface wave tomography code. FMTOMO: The forward problem of traveltime prediction is solved using a multi-stage fast marching method (FMM), which is a sophisticated grid-based eikonal solver.

item.title: Seismological data processing codes
item.description: Retrieve seismology waveforms Running the scripts and examples - Web Service Fetch scripts - IRIS SeisCode SOD - Demo IRIS-WS:A Java API that allows direct access to data and information at the DMC from within your programs. Data processing Ambient noise New Codes for Ambient Seismic Noise Analysis seissuite 0.1.3 : Python Package Index MSNoise | A Python Package for Monitoring Seismic Velocity Changes using Ambient Seismic Noise

item.title: Seismology Data
item.description: Seismic waveforms FDSN Earthquake Center 国家测震台网地震波形数据管理与共享平台 IRIS DMC Google Map Service Usage International Seismological Centre WebDC3 at eida.gfz-potsdam.de EarthScope USArray Data Management Short Course MUSTANG: Browser station info. (PDF, continuity and so on) which can be obtained from IRIS seismic phase peaking tools PhaseLink: A deep learning approach to seismic phase association PSPicker: a matlab tool for automatic phase picking and event location
